div.div: CURSE YOU SQUIGGLY BLOCK!
How the secret to the popular game’s success is that it takes advantage of the mind's basic pleasure in tidying up and uses it against us.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T8642k&via=Digg&text=The Psychology Of Tetris

div.div: THANKS MATH

div.a: How Some Algebra Just Improved Wireless Bandwidth By Tenfold

div.div: Academic researchers have improved wireless bandwidth by an order of magnitude—not by adding base stations, tapping more spectrum, or cranking up transmitter wattage, but by using algebra to eliminate the network-clogging task of resending dropped packets of data.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RhCyct&via=Digg&text=How Some Algebra Just Improved Wireless Bandwidth By Tenfold

div.div: YOU'VE PROBABLY ALREADY SEEN IT
Here it is.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TR0eTY&via=Digg&text=Apple Unveils iPad Mini

div.div: ANATOMY OF AN INTERNET WAR

div.a: What Is The Deal With The War Between Reddit And Gawker?

div.div: A history of the conflict between Reddit and Gawker and how it came to be.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QSIaru&via=Digg&text=What Is The Deal With The War Between Reddit And Gawker?

div.div: ALGORITHMS FOR APPETIZERS
Adam Roberts was recently invited to give a talk at Google's Mountain View headquarters, but he was more excited about his lunch than his talk.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QOQLLQ&via=Digg&text=Lunch At The Googleplex

div.div: BUT DO THEY MAKE BAYONETS?

The West won’t supply them with heavy weaponry, so rebels must make their own guns and bombs to fight off the government’s aerial attacks. Take a tour of a secret arms workshop on the outskirts of Aleppo.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X6NX2n&via=Digg&text=Inside Syria's 'Candy Factories'

div.div: DANTE KNEW NOTHING

div.a: The Nine Circles Of Internet Hell

div.div: "To symbolize the randomness and disorientation of lust, the pop-ups will keep coming one after the other and they’ll be the kind you can’t X out because when you click the X, you only open another ad. Forever and ever, for all eternity until you drown in computer porn viruses."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rfyhbg&via=Digg&text=The Nine Circles Of Internet Hell

div.div: STOCKING UP

div.a: Is This Man The Reason Romney Wants A Bigger Navy?

div.div: For one of Romney’s most important advisers on Navy issues, a man who oversaw a massive naval expansion for Pres. Ronald Reagan, there’s more at stake than U.S. national security.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T8Rd7C&via=Digg&text=Is This Man The Reason Romney Wants A Bigger Navy?

div.div: VENN DIAGRAM PIZZA
The Möbius bagel isn't the only edible expression of human genius to grace the Internet. And thank goodness.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QRUj07&via=Digg&text=11 Awesome Math Foods

div.div: EXTREME CLOSE-UPS

div.a: The Best Microscope Photos Of The Year

div.div: Every year for nearly four decades, Nikon has received hundreds of entries in its Small World microscope photography contest. Every year, the images are more amazing, and this year's winners -- selected from nearly 2,000 submissions -- are undoubtedly the best yet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ux30CY&via=Digg&text=The Best Microscope Photos Of The Year

div.div: LIFE AFTER PLAYBOY

div.a: Compelling Portraits Of Retired Playboy Bunnies

div.div: What happens to the women of Playboy’s clubs after they retire their bunny ears and cottontails?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SjjMBe&via=Digg&text=Compelling Portraits Of Retired Playboy Bunnies

div.div: WIKIPEDIA HAUNTED HOUSE

div.a: Wikipedia Entries That Will Make You Believe In Ghosts

div.div: In the spirit of Halloween, here are some Wikipedia entries to read in the dark.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PP2FKN&via=Digg&text=Wikipedia Entries That Will Make You Believe In Ghosts

div.div: BECAUSE IT'S REAL!

div.a: How Have The 2012 Doomsday Myths Become Part Of Our Accepted Lexicon?

div.div: How has something that is steeped in nonsense with no scientific accuracy whatsoever managed to capture such attention?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X3K3Hu&via=Digg&text=How Have The 2012 Doomsday Myths Become Part Of Our Accepted Lexicon?

div.div: PICTURES WILL COST YOU

div.a: The Many Creepy Mascots Of Times Square

div.div: Ah, Times Square. Where tourists come to get their full whiff of “the New York Experience.” Where you can get your picture taken with immigrants stuffed inside sweaty, janky mascot hides of your favorite childhood heroes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RTN88q&via=Digg&text=The Many Creepy Mascots Of Times Square

div.div: NO PARKING TICKETS IN THESE PLACES

div.a: The Most Amazing Parking Spaces In The World

div.div: Nothing is better than getting a good parking space, but could there be a greatest space?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XP7HXU&via=Digg&text=The Most Amazing Parking Spaces In The World

div.div: DID THEY BRING BACK CLIPPY?

div.a: Microsoft Gambles On A Touch-Based Future

div.div: Windows 8 is a rebirth, a "reimagining" of Windows and the entire Microsoft brand. It's also the single riskiest project that Microsoft has ever embarked upon — a bet from Redmond that users can adapt to a new way of computing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RTnGjd&via=Digg&text=Microsoft Gambles On A Touch-Based Future

div.div: BORN THAT WAY

div.a: Biologist Names Fern After Lady Gaga

div.div: Members of the new genus "bear a distinct DNA sequence spelling GAGA."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vm2xPR&via=Digg&text=Biologist Names Fern After Lady Gaga

div.div: YOU'D PROBABLY BE A BETTER PERSON

div.a: What If Facebook Had No Numbers

div.div: Every time you login the numbers are there, feeding your addiction to the site—but what would it be like if they disappeared? Would a weight be lifted?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RTSksO&via=Digg&text=What If Facebook Had No Numbers

div.div: ARE YOU READY TO COMMIT?

div.a: Woman Posts Boyfriend Request On GitHub, Requires Access To His Server

div.div: "It is with a sense of urgency that I've decided to invite people to contact me here."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TdcYaJ&via=Digg&text=Woman Posts Boyfriend Request On GitHub, Requires Access To His Server

div.div: GOOD THING WE LEAVE IT UP TO OHIO

div.a: If The World Picked The U.S. President, Election Would Be A Blowout

div.div: If the world had its say, this election would be a blowout.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RfkIIN&via=Digg&text=If The World Picked The U.S. President, Election Would Be A Blowout

div.div: IMPORTANT EXPLAINERS

div.a: What Happens When You Flush A Toilet On An Airplane?

div.div: Airborne waste control technology could put the Jetsons to shame. Here's what happens when you flush at 35,000 feet up.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P08XWC&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You Flush A Toilet On An Airplane?

div.div: THEY ACCEPTED JESUS BEFORE IT WAS COOL

Mars Hill members talk about sex, drink alcohol, get tattoos, and swear. They listen to Fleet Foxes; they love Star Wars and graffiti art. They also believe homosexuality is a sin, men are meant to lead, and wives must submit to their husbands as the church submits to God.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Relbef&via=Digg&text=Inside The New Hipster Megachurch

div.div: 'MAKING IT RAIN' IS TAXABLE

div.a: Lap Dances Are NOT Art, Says Court

div.div: New York's Court of Appeals has just made a decision about a Very Important Topic: Whether lap dances can be considered art—and therefore can be exempt from taxes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S0VRcq&via=Digg&text=Lap Dances Are NOT Art, Says Court

div.div: JULIET LUVS ROMEO 4EVA

div.a: What Would Classic Literary Characters Leave As Their Away Messages?

div.div: What would happen if your favorite literary characters were 13-year-olds on the internet?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XPt1wb&via=Digg&text=What Would Classic Literary Characters Leave As Their Away Messages?

div.div: YOUR GUT IS PROBABLY RIGHT

div.a: Your Body Can Predict The Future Without Conscious Clues

div.div: Humans can predict the future when we have some evidence--like clouds and the smell of rain hinting at a storm. But can we anticipate future events without sensory clues?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QTp98C&via=Digg&text=Your Body Can Predict The Future Without Conscious Clues

div.div: INDIANA JONES

div.a: These Behind-The-Scenes Photos Make 'Raiders Of The Lost Ark' Even More Awesome

div.div: These behind-the-scenes photos dug up by Retronaut feature Harrison Ford moodily taking direction, cast and crew hanging out on set, and that famous golden idol looking a little less golden.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rftkit&via=Digg&text=These Behind-The-Scenes Photos Make 'Raiders Of The Lost Ark' Even More Awesome

div.div: NOW THAT'S A NEWS DUMP

div.a: Zynga Just Laid Off Over 100 Employees During The Apple Keynote

div.div: In a further sign of trouble at Zynga, news has surfaced that the social gaming company has just laid off more than 100 employees in its Austin office.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RTR0Gs&via=Digg&text=Zynga Just Laid Off Over 100 Employees During The Apple Keynote

div.div: EMAIL SNAFUs

div.a: Soup Chain Sends Incredibly Offensive (And Hilarious) Blast Email

div.div: Customers on the mailing list for fast-casual franchise Hale and Hearty received an email full of promises this morning. One gift on offer was a piping hot cup of free soup. The other was service from a "c*nt" named Mary.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/POGvZ7&via=Digg&text=Soup Chain Sends Incredibly Offensive (And Hilarious) Blast Email

div.div: FRICTION STIR WELDING

div.a: The Obscure 'Welding Institute' That Made The Ridiculously Thin New iMac Possible

div.div: The new iMac would not have been possible without an obscure metal joining process called friction stir welding.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rfnn58&via=Digg&text=The Obscure 'Welding Institute' That Made The Ridiculously Thin New iMac Possible
